sentences.en: a sandwich shop that sells every possible permutation of meat and bread
sentences.cn: 出售各种肉类和面包组合的三明治店

sentences.en: All forms of life are created by the different permutation and combination of these basic pairs.
sentences.cn: 生命现象的多姿多彩,形形色色都是由这些碱基的不同排列组合所造成的.

sentences.en: By introducing the original permutation and the region, the conception of single permutation is proposed.
sentences.cn: 在引入原排列和区的概念的基础上, 提出了单排列的概念.

sentences.en: Every sort of permutation and combination is possible in human nature.
sentences.cn: 火的本性可能有各种交织和组合的情况.

sentences.en: Meanwhile, the article also put forward such corresponding techniques as readjustment of word and focus permutation.
sentences.cn: 并提出了相应的翻译对策,如调整语序,迁移句子重心.

sentences.en: More important is, look from the angle of electronics, they think new permutation cannot be run.
sentences.cn: 更重要的是, 从电子学的角度看, 它们认为新的排列无法运作.

sentences.en: Objective To study the method of the artificial thigh bone permutation perioperatively for advanced age.
sentences.cn: 目的探讨高龄人工股骨头置换术围手术期的治疗方法.

sentences.en: Other enumeration problems lead us to the study of orbits of permutation groups.
sentences.cn: 其它的计数问题引导我们去研究置换群的轨道.

sentences.en: Permutation code broke through the traditional concept of block algorithm, and improved the encrypt intensity greatly.
sentences.cn: 排列码加密解密算法突破了传统的分组密码的旧观念, 使加密强度有了较大幅度的提高.

sentences.en: The construction of the permutation depends on the single permutation and the original permutation.
sentences.cn: 单排列和原排列是构造排列的材料.

sentences.en: The data compressing method based on constant grade makes use of permutation and combination theory.
sentences.cn: 常数级压缩方法利用排列组合原理,适于压缩字节内容无规律的文件.

sentences.en: The symmetry group is the permutation group acting to exchange particles of the same type.
sentences.cn: 在对称组排列组表演交换微粒的同类型.

sentences.en: This paper deals with orthodox semirings whose additive idempotents satisfy permutation identities.
sentences.cn: 本文主要研究加法幂等元满足置换等式的纯整半环.

sentences.en: This paper makes use permutation method in the calculation of roundness error fitting the minimum conditions.
sentences.cn: 提出一种圆度误差评定的实用算法,利用线性规划单纯形法,按最小条件求得圆度误差.

sentences.en: Unique because that particular permutation has not appeared before.
sentences.cn: 之所以独一无二,是因为那种独特的基因排列组合以前不曾出现过.

sentences.en: Write a random permutation of the input lines to standard output.
sentences.cn: 把输入行按随机顺序写到标准输出.

trans.tran_cn: （一组事物可能的一种）序列，排列，排列中的任一组数字或文字
trans.tran_en: one of the different ways in which a number of things can be arranged
